name: 84663196-b42e-5bf0-8d1a-d863093f6725
notes: This service provides filter absorption photometer measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Waldhof, Germany (20110101 - 20120918). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Waldhof, Germany (20110101 - 20120918)
